property.name: someURL
property.value: URL of some endpoints and etc

target.name: displayproperties
target.echo: These are some system defined properties ${os.name} , ${java.version} , ${java.compiler} and ${java.home}
These are some user defined properties ${key} , ${someURL} , ${timeout settings}
These are some built in properties ${ant.home} , ${ant.version} , ${ant.project.default-target} and ${ant.project.name}
